page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF---
page.content: My alarm goes off at 7.3Oam.I get up and go to my mum and dad's room.My mum gets up and gets dressed and goes down stairs to make the breakfast and feeds Fred the fish.Then I get dressed and come down for my breakfast.After that I pack my bag and go up stairs to have a wash and clean my teeth.At 8.00am my dad goes to work.At 8.25am my mum drives me and my brother to school.My mum drops my brother off at the traffic lights and takes me to school. When I get to school I play in the playground for a few minutes .Then the bell goes and it's time to go into school.When we get into school it's assembly.After assembly it's maths until 10.40am. After break it's English,then lunch.In the afternoon we do art or science.At 3.30pm we go home After tea I played my cornet and then watched the 6 o'clock news.
